page.title: 05"Metheringham School"
page.content: The school is 14 years old and{Mr. {Hyde} the headmaster of the school at the moment has been headmaster since the new school opened.The school has{ {245}pupils.When pupils leave this school at eleven they go to the Boys' Grammar or Girls' High School at Sleaford, Billinghay Secondary Modern or Branston Comprehensive. The P.T.A is an association which helps parents and teachers to meet socially and raise money.The school has had {25 {teachers in 14 years .The school has {3 computers ,4 televisions,1 video {recorder, a swimming pool, showers and {changing rooms.}The school annually takes part in an inter schools sports competitions that includes{ {skittleball, netball, football and {athletics.}The school secretary had some new equipment, a electric typewriter and a photocopying machine.
